Title: Study for Math Exam
Description: Review chapters 1 to 5 and practice problems.

Title: Read History Chapter 3
Description: Read the assigned chapter and make notes for the upcoming quiz.

Title: Write English Essay
Description: Write a 1000-word essay on the topic 'The Role of Technology'.

Title: Prepare for Science Lab
Description: Go through the lab manual and prepare the materials for the experiment.

Title: Revise Programming Notes
Description: Go over the notes from the last programming class and do practice coding exercises.
